title: Trump Companies’ Defense Lawyers Are an Eclectic Team
description: The defense team includes a personal injury lawyer from Philadelphia and two New York criminal lawyers who have defended mobsters and white collar defendants.
dc:creator: William K. Rashbaum, Ben Protess and Jonah E. Bromwich

media:content.media:credit: Brandon Bell for The New York Times; Michael M. Santiago, via Getty Images
media:content.media:description: Michael van der Veen and Susan Necheles are leading members of the former president’s collection of lawyers.
